title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
desc: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

title: Intermediate Piano Techniques
desc: Advance your piano skills with intermediate techniques and challenging pieces.

title: Mastering the Violin
desc: Take your violin playing to the next level with master classes and performance tips.

desc: Learn the art of jazz improvisation with expert guidance and practice exercises.

title: Vocal Training for Beginners
desc: Improve your singing voice with basic vocal exercises and techniques.

title: Electronic Music Production
desc: Create your own electronic music tracks using popular software and techniques.
